pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read and Write 'MTrackJ Data Files' // 'MTrackJ' is an 'ImageJ' plugin for motion tracking and analysis (see https://imagescience.org/meijering/software/mtrackj/). This package reads and writes 'MTrackJ Data Files' ('.mdf', see https://imagescience.org/meijering/software/mtrackj/format/). It supports 2D data and read/writes cluster, point, and channel information. If desired, generates track identifiers that are unique over the clusters. See the project page for more information and examples.
